snippet: The choreographer Alexei Ratmansky has a project close to his heart for American Ballet Theater’s next season: a trilogy of works to Shostakovich, with one having its debut on Thursday.
abstract: Choreographer Alexei Ratmansky discusses American Ballet Theater's debut trilogy of works set to the music of composer Dmitri Shostakovich; pieces try to capture the Russian themes and preoccupations that were pervasive in his first two decades of life.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Alexei Ratmansky has a project close to his heart for American Ballet Theater’s next season: a trilogy of works to Shostakovich, with one having its debut on Thursday.

headline.main: For the Love of Shostakovich, the Destroyer
headline.print_headline: For the Love Of Shostakovich, The Destroyer
